nodes.full_name: Information security, cybersecurity and privacy protection — Information security controls
nodes.name: ISO/IEC 27002:2022
nodes.description: Reference set of generic information security controls including implementation guidance
Technical controls including systems security, cryptography, and access controls

nodes.purpose: To ensure secure authentication procedures
nodes.control_description: ISO 27002:2022 Control 8.5 - Secure Authentication: To ensure secure authentication procedures
nodes.implementation_guidance: Implementation guidance for Secure Authentication control

nodes.guideline_text: Organizations should implement secure authentication by establishing clear procedures and responsibilities. Regular review and updates should be conducted to ensure continued effectiveness.
nodes.measurement_criteria: Effectiveness can be measured through regular audits, compliance checks, and incident analysis related to secure authentication.
nodes.implementation_considerations: Consider organizational context, risk assessment results, and applicable legal requirements when implementing Secure Authentication.

nodes.guideline_text: Organizations should implement management responsibilities by establishing clear procedures and responsibilities. Regular review and updates should be conducted to ensure continued effectiveness.
nodes.measurement_criteria: Effectiveness can be measured through regular audits, compliance checks, and incident analysis related to management responsibilities.
nodes.implementation_considerations: Consider organizational context, risk assessment results, and applicable legal requirements when implementing Management Responsibilities.

nodes.purpose: To reduce opportunities for unauthorized or unintentional modification or misuse of information
nodes.control_description: ISO 27002:2022 Control 5.3 - Segregation of Duties: To reduce opportunities for unauthorized or unintentional modification or misuse of information
nodes.implementation_guidance: Implementation guidance for Segregation of Duties control

nodes.guideline_text: Organizations should implement segregation of duties by establishing clear procedures and responsibilities. Regular review and updates should be conducted to ensure continued effectiveness.
nodes.measurement_criteria: Effectiveness can be measured through regular audits, compliance checks, and incident analysis related to segregation of duties.
nodes.implementation_considerations: Consider organizational context, risk assessment results, and applicable legal requirements when implementing Segregation of Duties.

nodes.purpose: To ensure information security responsibilities are defined and allocated
nodes.control_description: ISO 27002:2022 Control 5.2 - Information Security Roles and Responsibilities: To ensure information security responsibilities are defined and allocated
nodes.implementation_guidance: Implementation guidance for Information Security Roles and Responsibilities control

nodes.guideline_text: Organizations should implement information security roles and responsibilities by establishing clear procedures and responsibilities. Regular review and updates should be conducted to ensure continued effectiveness.
nodes.measurement_criteria: Effectiveness can be measured through regular audits, compliance checks, and incident analysis related to information security roles and responsibilities.
nodes.implementation_considerations: Consider organizational context, risk assessment results, and applicable legal requirements when implementing Information Security Roles and Responsibilities.

nodes.purpose: To provide management direction and support for information security
nodes.control_description: ISO 27002:2022 Control 5.1 - Policies for Information Security: To provide management direction and support for information security
nodes.implementation_guidance: Implementation guidance for Policies for Information Security control

nodes.usage_context: Used to classify controls based on security domains
Used to classify controls based on operational capabilities
Used to classify controls based on cybersecurity concepts

nodes.guideline_text: Organizations should implement policies for information security by establishing clear procedures and responsibilities. Regular review and updates should be conducted to ensure continued effectiveness.
nodes.measurement_criteria: Effectiveness can be measured through regular audits, compliance checks, and incident analysis related to policies for information security.
nodes.implementation_considerations: Consider organizational context, risk assessment results, and applicable legal requirements when implementing Policies for Information Security.
